titleStmt.title: Unto the questions sent me last night, I pray accept of the ensuing answer, under the title of two questions concerning the power of the supream magistrate about religion, and the worship of God with one about tythes, proposed and resolved.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
